include_directories(
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/jaulibs
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)

set (rivergen_SRCS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/debug.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/basic_types.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/jaulib/src/environment.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gentech/gentech.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-river/river.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-river/river_gen.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-river/river_genparin.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/gen-river/river_main.cpp
# autogenerated files
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/../version.cpp
)

add_executable (rivergen_exe ${rivergen_SRCS})
set_target_properties(rivergen_exe PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME rivergen)

install(TARGETS rivergen_exe RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_BINDIR})
